prompt:
Image Prompt:
Create an image of a majestic figure cloaked in robes of shimmering gold, holding scales in one hand and a sword in the other, standing on a mountaintop with rays of light emanating from behind. The figure exudes a sense of righteousness and authority, embodying the concept of the God of justice as depicted in Christian teachings. The background should feature storm clouds parting to reveal a glimpse of a serene, heavenly realm, symbolizing divine judgment and fairness.
